AboutMe.content: I study Datta Science at the Indiana University, Bloomington with an expected graduation date of May 2023. You can click around on the Desktop to see my Projects, Resume and my old Portfolio Sites.

Passions: Building applications based on health informatics
Learning and using various cloud services
Full-Stack Web Development, with a forte in backend

Hobbies.text: I love making my own music

Projects.name: Pnemonia Detector Web App
Projects.description: A web application built using ReactJS and FastAPI to decode and send chest x-ray images to a tensorflow keras model saved on AWS S3.

Projects.name: MHC Class-1 Binding Site Predictor
Projects.description: A matrix based methodology python implementation to calculate potential binding sites for a virus on 47 MHC Class-1 Alleles with a threshold setting of upto 10%.

Projects.name: Pokédex
Projects.description: A simple pokémon encyclopedia made with React, PokéAPI & tailwind

Projects.name: Cowin-Notify App
Projects.description: A simple website, that will register users for coronavirus vaccine slots.

Projects.name: Remote Light Monitoring System
Projects.description: An app developed on VueJS-Laravel for displaying various solar light parameters and controlling the led status
